website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty ring that comes in many sizes, but you only get one for the price.
pros: This product wins points for being very strong
The company makes the same product in several sizes from 4 to 10 inches
Thick metal that doesn't bend out of shape
Can be used to cut cake
cons: This 8" diameter ring is only 2 inches deep rather than the 3 inches offered by some other models

customer_reviews.title: Misshapen
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product was like I expected, except that it is misshapen! I expected it to be like a round cookie cutter just larger and stronger but it is not a perfect circle and makes everything look just unprofessional.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: High quality, wished they made the rings in more sizes
customer_reviews.text: Sept 2020: Updated my review from 4 stars to 5 stars. I bought more of these rings and the quality has changed. The ring seems to use some type of aluminum alloy now and is not dishwasher safe. HOWEVER I do like the new quality. It’s sturdier, doesn’t bend under pressure and is perfectly round. I’ll be continuing to buy pastry rings from this company in the future. Excellent heavy duty stainless steel pastry rings. Only complaint is that the rings were slightly oblong shaped, which I fixed by pressing on both sides of the ring until it fit one of my circular mixing bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a ring this size for a while. I use it to cut patties when I made venison burgers. It is heavy duty. I have also been using it on my griddle, it works great for hash browns. The only thing I found that could be better it that neither side was completely flat. If you lay it down it still has a slight gap on either side.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These are way thicker than I expected, I don't see them ever getting bent out of shape from normal use, they sit flat in a pan and will be perfect for my needs, I wanted an egg frying ring that would hold several eggs at a time and I couldn't be happier with these
customer_reviews.author: John m.f. Doe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for what I needed, which was to make mini Momofuku Milk Bar layer cakes. They’re very sturdy and a quick rinse & wipe of paper towel cleans them off for more use.
customer_reviews.author: today4ulove

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the smallest one out of the options and liked it so much I went back and bought more. Very heavy duty and difficult to bend. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: cguidry44

customer_reviews.title: Seamless construction and very high quality.
customer_reviews.text: No seams and very sturdy. Better than I expected. Works very well on all surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Kimball

customer_reviews.title: The shape is oval
customer_reviews.text: Thick and heavy,but the shape is not round,it’s almost like oval,so not good for making round cake。
customer_reviews.author: steveweng

customer_reviews.title: Not really a 6” ring
customer_reviews.text: This ring is definitely not 6”. It is 5.75”. I bought this to add to the other 3 rings I have that are 6”. Once I baked a cake with it, I immediately noticed it was much smaller than it should be. Please don’t buy this if you’re expecting a 6” ring! Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: jeremy pros

customer_reviews.title: Heavyweight an excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these rings and they make the perfect chocolate chip or snickerdoodle cookie. Putting these on a cookie sheet ensures a perfectly round cookie. I’m very happy with this purchase as they were a higher quality than I had expected
customer_reviews.author: Sue Olsson

customer_reviews.title: Thick gauge steel
customer_reviews.text: Made of really nice thick gauge steel. Not bendable by my hands, but it came in just a padded envelope instead of a box and I think it’s slightly out of round.
customer_reviews.author: inu

customer_reviews.title: Plastic wrap doesn’t stick
customer_reviews.text: Plastic wrap doesn’t stick to it so I had to tape the plastic wrap when I was making a mousse cake in this ring.
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with how sturdy this cutter is, no worries about it losing its shape.
customer_reviews.author: Landy Barbera

customer_reviews.title: Cake ring
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and exactly what I was looking for. High quality cake ring. Very strong, not flimsy
customer_reviews.author: EHCNSC

customer_reviews.title: sturdy Pastry ring
customer_reviews.text: I love this pastry ring. it is very sturdy and good quality. highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Koolkat

customer_reviews.title: Bakes cakes cookie pizzas and whatever else you need!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy! Easy to use and most importantly it can bake cakes 😂 I needed it for a cookie pizza project we worked on and everything came out flawlessly
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Quigg

customer_reviews.title: This thing does exactly what I want it to do ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing does exactly what I want it to do. Only complaint I have is that it is not 100% flat on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Upset customer

customer_reviews.title: Necessary To Make Proper Quiche
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this is far greater than what I was expecting. No flex, no visible seam, very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Athouse

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, durable
customer_reviews.text: This a great product, easy to clean, it gives great shape to cakes. Truly love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great costumer service
customer_reviews.text: A great size! Awesome for cakes and tarts. Heavy, not a 100% round but is malleable so you can force it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best. Patties.  Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for making hamburger patties. One of those burger press contraptions is too fiddley for me. This is so much simpler and doesn't pack down the meat the way a burger press does. Much better texture with this. Perfect size and easy to clean. The seam in the steel is very hard to find and smooth. Very heavy duty. The 4.5 inch ring I got was 2" deep. A little shallower would have been ideal, but that's splitting hairs. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: K. Villa

customer_reviews.title: Best Mold
customer_reviews.text: After buying some round molds locally, I kept finding them somewhat flimsy and thin, which while practical, always gave the impression that they would be easy to bend. Well, problem solved with this heavy gauge 5" mold. Not only is it build like a tank, its width is quite practical for my food decoration obsession. Beautifully crafted too, and for the price, a real bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Troubadour

customer_reviews.title: The product is good for my applications
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is heavy duty. It is not flat enough in a sheet pan for cake batter though, at least not my unit. The mail carrier shoved it hard into the mailbox and bent it somewhat. Wish I could give the mail carrier a review. The product is good for my applications.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best hamburger mold yet!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! I use it as a hamburger mold and it makes the perfect size around and I can control the thickness. Best of all it is seamless and easily to clean up. Much more sanitary than those plastic "hamburger presses".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's not round
customer_reviews.text: It is not round and it looks used. I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Substantial with nicely finished, smooth edges. Perfect for making round loaves of yeast breads.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This mold is made of a thick, high quality metal, and it is highly unlikely that it will loose its shape. I have not come across another mold that is of the same quality. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Better Days

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for punching out cake rounds for a layer cake. Also great for stacking layers.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica WR Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon saves the cake!  I couldn’t find this ring anywhere but here.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my Christina Tosi cake! Very happy birthday girl.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Miles

customer_reviews.title: Great for making hamburgers
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to review a metal ring, but I like it. It is very deep, so you can stack a lot in there if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P Catt

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: The ring is made of pretty solid material and has a good round shape to it. I have tried other rings before and this one is the best one for the price.
customer_reviews.author: shain hashemi

customer_reviews.title: Works exacty for what I had in mind when I ordered it
customer_reviews.text: Works exacty for what I had in mind when I ordered it. Who knows I may even use it for its intended use some day but currently I use it to raise up my steamer basket.
customer_reviews.author: Blooblzr

customer_reviews.title: Great for personal pizzas
customer_reviews.text: I use these rings to shape ground chicken into small pizza crusts. Perfect sized for me and one pound of ground chicken makes six personal sized pizzas I can eat throughout the week.
customer_reviews.author: Chiprj

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Solid.
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Heavy gauge. I don’t expect it to bend easily which is a good thing. Weighs 9.38oz (267g)
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: works to shape my food prepping purposes.
customer_reviews.text: works for what I needed but its material composition does makes me feel a bit iffy as to whether or not it should be touching my food.
customer_reviews.author: Lampson

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and solid! No seams. This is a quality piece of cooking equipment! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Does its job does not feel cheap it's well-made and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do it's thick and feels heavy and well made I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Acuna

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Used to cut out cakes for checkerboard pattern. Worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen A

product_meta.title: Round Cake Mold/Pastry Ring, S/S, Heavy Gauge. (8" x 2")
feature_bullets: 16 Gauge stainless steel cake ring. 8" D x 2" H
Straight-sided cake / pastry mold perfect for baking over oven.
Constructed of high quality, long lasting stainless steel.
